name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

lessons.name: Thrust and Specific Impulse
lessons.description: Detailed explanation of thrust, specific impulse, and their roles in rocket propulsion.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

lessons.name: Fuel Mixture Ratios
lessons.description: Analyzing the optimal fuel mixture ratios for efficient combustion.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

lessons.name: Nozzle Cooling Techniques
lessons.description: Exploring cooling methods to increase nozzle longevity and performance.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Fluid Dynamics
lessons.description: Basic principles of fluid dynamics and how they apply to aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Lift and Drag Forces
lessons.description: Understanding the relationship between lift, drag, and airfoil shapes.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Characteristics
lessons.description: Study of fluid behavior at subsonic speeds.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow Characteristics
lessons.description: Study of fluid behavior at supersonic speeds and shock waves.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Materials
lessons.description: Overview of materials used to protect spacecraft from high thermal loads.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer Mechanisms
lessons.description: Understanding heat transfer processes such as conduction, convection, and radiation in aerodynamics.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Load-Bearing Structures
lessons.description: Design of primary load-bearing structures in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Material Selection for Spacecraft
lessons.description: Choosing lightweight, durable materials for spacecraft structures.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Orbital Parameters
lessons.description: Overview of orbital parameters and their influence on satellite trajectories.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws of Motion
lessons.description: Study of Keplerâ€™s Laws and their application to modern orbital mechanics.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Power Systems for Spacecraft
lessons.description: Study of power generation, storage, and distribution systems in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Life Support Systems
lessons.description: Overview of life support systems used in manned space missions.

name: Satellite Communication Systems
description: Principles of satellite communication and signal transmission.

lessons.name: Signal Propagation in Space
lessons.description: Understanding how signals propagate in the vacuum of space.

lessons.name: Communication Satellite Design
lessons.description: Designing communication systems for satellites and optimizing data transmission.

name: Satellite Orbits and Navigation
description: Detailed study of satellite orbits and navigation systems.

lessons.name: GNSS and Satellite Navigation
lessons.description: Global Navigation Satellite Systems (GNSS) and their role in navigation.

lessons.name: Satellite Orbit Determination
lessons.description: Methods of determining and maintaining satellite orbits.
